Docs.summary: Adds a if an existing descriptor with the same and an implementation that does not already exist in .
Docs.remarks: Use when registing a service implementation of a service type that supports multiple registrations of the same service type. Using is not idempotent and can add duplicate instances if called twice. Using will prevent registration of multiple implementation types.
